ReinforcedGate.description: The Gate (Missile Bay) of this castle has been reinforced to ward of hordes of fans.

FramjificentCore.name: FramjificentCore
FramjificentCore.description: Draw a card whenever you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a card

ParadoxGrimoire.description: Every 10th card you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> grants 1 extra <c=energy>Energy</c> and <c=action>Draw</c> a card

Tower.name: Tower
Tower.description: This is a Framjificent Castle, but not very mobile <c=downside>Max Evade 4</c> <c=downside>No WarpPrep</c>

Hex.name: Hexbolt
Hex.description: Applies <c=cardtrait>Weak</c> to the enemy ship part hit and 2 <c=status>Missile Malfunction<c/>, never misses

Chaos.name: Chaosbolt
Chaos.description: 40% chance to apply 1 <c=status>Boost</c> 60% chance to apply 1 of <c=status>Heat, Corrode or Missile Malfunction<c/>, never misses

Witch.name: Witchbolt
Witch.description: Witchbolt, deals damage equal to the number of enemy ship parts, never misses
